sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
over another
, je tik nad drugo, bodisi da se opira nanjo bodisi da je med njima prostor.

seg.quote: I had reached the little bridge over the stream.
...the monument over the west door.
Leave it to dry over the back of the sofa.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
over another
, prekriva drugo.

seg.quote: Place a piece of blotting paper over the stain.
Students were spraying paint over each other.

sense.def:
Kadar gledamo ali govorimo
over an object
, to počnemo prek gornjega roba tega predmeta.

seg.quote: The ponies would come and look over the wall.
She was watching him over the rim of her cup.

sense.def:
To look over a piece of writing or a group of things
pomeni na hitro pregledati napisano besedilo ali skupine stvari.

seg.quote: He ran his eye over one particular paragraph.

sense.def:
Kadar okno gleda
over a piece of land
, skozenj vidimo določen kos zemlje.

seg.quote: The windows look out over a park.

sense.def:
Če gremo
over to a place
, odidemo do določenega kraja.

seg.quote: The doctor walked over to the door.
I've got some friends coming over tonight.
Liz, come over here.

sense.def:
Kadar gre oseba ali stvar
over a boundary
, na primer prek reke ali mostu, ali kadar gre oseba ali stvar
over an area of land
, gre prek te meje ali ozemlja in pride na drugo stran.

seg.quote: His pen moved rapidly over the paper.
...on the way back over the Channel.
Castle stepped over the dog.
They throw their rubbish over the fence into the neighbour's garden.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
over
opišemo položaj ali kraj, ki je stran od nas.

seg.quote: Eastwards over the Severn lie the hills.
Mr Stryker was standing over by the window.

sense.def:
To lean over
pomeni upogniti telo v določeno smer.

seg.quote: Pat leaned over and picked it up.
He crouched over a typewriter.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
rolls over
ali
is turned over
, se položaj tiste stvari spremeni tako, da je obrnjena v drugo smer.

seg.quote: He flicked over the page.
She tipped the pan over.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
over a particular amount or measurement
, je večje od določene količine ali mere.

seg.quote: They paid out over 3 million pounds.
...people aged 80 or over.
She did it for over a week.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka dejavnost
over
ali
all over
, se konča.

seg.quote: Rodin's search was over.
Why worry her when it's all over?

sense.def:
Kadar imamo nadzor ali vpliv
over other people
, nadzorujemo druge ali vplivamo nanje.

seg.quote: ...his authority over them.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
over
uvedemo tudi vzrok za nesporazum ali določeno čustvo.

seg.quote: ...disagreements over administrative policies.
They were always quarrelling over women.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
over a period of time
, se dogaja v tem obdobju.

seg.quote: He'd had flu over Christmas.
...a process developed over many decades.

sense.def:
All over a place
pomeni v vsakem delu določenega kraja.

seg.quote: I've been all over Austria.
They come from all over the world.

sense.def:
Over there
pomeni nekje daleč od govorca ali zunaj njegove države.
Over here
pomeni v bližini govorca ali v državi, v kateri je.

seg.quote: Who's the woman over there?
Are you over here on a trip?

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se nekaj dogaja
all over again
, mislimo, da se dogaja še enkrat in da je nadležno, utrudljivo ali neprijetno.

seg.quote: The whole thing began all over again.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se je nekaj dogajalo
over and over
ali
over and over again
, mislimo, da se je zgodilo velikokrat.

seg.quote: Over and over, the same stories kept cropping up.
I read it over and over again.
